00026 
00027 template <class IF , class T>
00028 class tlm_event_finder_t
00029 : public sc_event_finder
00030 {
00031 public:
00032 
00033     // constructor
00034 
00035     tlm_event_finder_t( const sc_port_base& port_,
00036                        const sc_event& (IF::*event_method_) ( tlm_tag<T> * ) const )
00037         : sc_event_finder( port_ ), m_event_method( event_method_ )
00038         {}
00039 
00040     // destructor (does nothing)
00041 
00042     virtual ~tlm_event_finder_t()
00043         {}
00044 
00045     virtual const sc_event& find_event() const;
00046 
00047 private:
00048 
00049     const sc_event& (IF::*m_event_method) ( tlm_tag<T> * ) const;
00050 
00051 private:
00052 
00053     // disabled
00054     tlm_event_finder_t();
00055     tlm_event_finder_t( const tlm_event_finder_t<IF,T>& );
00056     tlm_event_finder_t<IF,T>& operator = ( const tlm_event_finder_t<IF,T>& );
00057 };
00058 
00059 
00060 template <class IF , class T>
00061 inline
00062 const sc_event&
00063 tlm_event_finder_t<IF,T>::find_event() const
00064 {
00065     const IF* iface = DCAST<const IF*>( port().get_interface() );
00066     if( iface == 0 ) {
00067         report_error( SC_ID_FIND_EVENT_, "port is not bound" );
00068     }
00069     return (CCAST<IF*>( iface )->*m_event_method) ( 0 );
00070 }
